DiscountHand.name: Discount Hand
DiscountHand.description: All cards in your hand cost <c=boldPink>{{Discount}}</c> less energy until played, or until combat ends.

Strengthen.name: Strengthen
Strengthen.description: This card deals <c=boldPink>{{Damage}}</c> extra damage for the rest of combat.

StrengthenHand.name: Strengthen Hand
StrengthenHand.description: All cards in your hand deal <c=boldPink>{{Damage}}</c> extra damage for the rest of combat.

browseSource.UpgradableCardsAnywhereToTypeABrowseSour: Upgrade a Card to type A
browseSource.UpgradableCardsAnywhereToTypeBBrowseSour: Upgrade a Card to type B

Strengthen.name: Strengthen
Strengthen.description: This card deals <c=boldPink>{{Damage}}</c> extra damage for the rest of combat.

CrunchTime.name: Crunch Time
CrunchTime.description: Each turn, if you have less than 3 <c=card>Burn Outs</c> in hand, gain {0} <c=card>Burn Out(s)</c>.

Briefcase.name: BRIEFCASE
Briefcase.description: On your first turn, put a <c=card>Bullet Point</c>, <c=card>Slide Transition</c>, <c=card>Leverage</c>, or <c=card>Brainstorm</c> into your <c=keyword>hand</c>.

Candy.name: CANDY
Candy.description: Choose 2 unupgraded cards in your deck. Upgrade the first one to type A, and the second to type B.

Coupon.name: COUPON
Coupon.description: On your first turn, choose a card in your deck. <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> it.

EspressoShot.name: ESPRESSO SHOT
EspressoShot.description: On your first turn, put a <c=card>Burn Out</c> into your <c=keyword>hand</c>.

Frugality.name: FRUGALITY
Frugality.description: Gain 1 extra <c=energy>ENERGY</c> every turn. <c=downside>You can no longer visit repair yards.</c>
dialogue: A penny saved is a penny earned.
No time to stop, we're very busy.

JumpTheCurve.name: JUMP THE CURVE
JumpTheCurve.description: When a card is added to your deck outside of combat, <c=cardtrait>discount</c> and <c=cardtrait>temporarily upgrade</c> it.

RAndD.name: R&D
RAndD.description: Each turn, add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>temp</c> cards from any of the current crewmates to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.

JohnsonBooks.name: SUMMONING STAFF
JohnsonBooks.description: The first time you play a <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> card each turn, gain 1 <c=status>SHARD</c>.

JohnsonBucket.name: TRIMMING FAT
JohnsonBucket.description: <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> the first <c=trash>trash</c> card drawn each turn.

JohnsonCat.name: NEVERMIND
JohnsonCat.description: During combat, when choosing a card to add to your deck, you may choose <c=card>None of the Above</c> instead.

JohnsonDizzy.name: FORTIFY
JohnsonDizzy.description: <c=cardtrait>Strengthen</c> also increases the amount of <c=status>SHIELD</c> cards give. Each combat, choose a card in your deck to <c=cardtrait>Strengthen</c>.

JohnsonIsaac.name: CARE PACKAGE
JohnsonIsaac.description: On the first turn of each combat, add either a <c=card>Supply</c> or a <c=card>Demand</c> to your draw pile.

JohnsonMax.name: TREND CHASER
JohnsonMax.description: Every 3 turns, <c=cardtrait>discount</c> all copies of the most abundant card in your deck. Ties result in no discount.

JohnsonRiggs.name: PLAN B
JohnsonRiggs.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> if a card in your hand is upgraded to B.

JohnsonTy.name: GUERILLA MARKETING
JohnsonTy.description: The first time a <c=cardtrait>Wild</c> card is played each turn, <c=cardtrait>temp upgrade</c> it.

description.None: Choose a card in your <c=keyword>deck</c> to <c=cardtrait>temp upgrade</c>.
description.A: Choose a card in your <c=keyword>deck</c> to <c=cardtrait>discount</c> and <c=cardtrait>temp upgrade</c>.
description.B: Choose a card in your <c=keyword>deck</c> to <c=cardtrait>strengthen</c> and <c=cardtrait>temp upgrade</c>.

description.None: Add either a <c=card>Bullet Point</c> or a <c=card>Slide Transition</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.A: Add either a <c=card>Bullet Point</c> or a <c=card>Slide Transition</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.B: Add a <c=card>Bullet Point</c> and a <c=card>Slide Transition</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.

description.None: Attack for {{Damage}} dmg. On kill, make a <c=cardtrait>temp upgrade</c> permanent.
description.A: Attack for {{Damage}} dmg. On kill, choose a card in your deck to upgrade.
description.B: Attack for {{Damage}} dmg. On kill, make a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> card permanent.

Outsource.name: Outsource
Outsource.description: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>temp</c> cards from any of the current crewmates to <c=keyword>hand</c>.

description.None: Choose a card in your <c=keyword>hand</c> to <c=cardtrait>temporarily upgrade</c>.
description.A: Choose a card in your <c=keyword>hand</c> to <c=cardtrait>temporarily upgrade</c>.
description.B: Draw 2, then choose a card in your <c=keyword>hand</c> to <c=cardtrait>temporarily upgrade</c>.

description.None: Your left & rightmost card <c=cardtrait>temp upgrade</c> to type A and B respectively.
description.A: Your left & rightmost card <c=cardtrait>temp upgrade</c> to type A and B respectively.

description.None: Add either a <c=card>Leverage</c> or a <c=card>Brainstorm</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.A: Add either a <c=card>Leverage</c> or a <c=card>Brainstorm</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.B: Add a <c=card>Leverage</c> and a <c=card>Brainstorm</c> to your <c=keyword>discard pile</c>.

description.A: Gain 1 <c=status>shield</c>. <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> the left and rightmost card.

description.None: Add either a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Layout</c> or a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Strategize</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.
description.A: Add a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Layout</c> and a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Strategize</c> to your <c=keyword>hand</c>.
description.B: Add either a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Layout</c> or a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Strategize</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.

description.None: Add a <c=card>Second Quarter</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.A: Add a <c=card>Second Quarter</c> to the top of your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.B: Add a <c=card>Second Quarter</c> to your <c=keyword>draw and discard pile</c>.

description.None: Add a <c=card>Third Quarter</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.A: Add a <c=card>Third Quarter</c> to the top of your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.B: Add a <c=card>Third Quarter</c> to your <c=keyword>draw and discard pile</c>.

description.A: Add a <c=card>Deadline</c> to the top of your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>.
description.B: Add a <c=card>Deadline</c> to your <c=keyword>draw and discard pile</c>.

description.None: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=2D3F61>Johnson</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=2D3F61>Johnson</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=2D3F61>Johnson</c> cards to your hand.
